monogr.title: Q.D.B.V. Theses medicae miscellaneae, quas auctoritate & jussu magnifici Senatus Academici pro vacante professione medica publico competitorum examini proponit Claudius Passavant, Med. & Chir. Doctor, Facult. Med. assessor. Respondente juvene praestantissimo Joh. Casparo Schobingero, Med. Cult. Sangall. ad diem VII. Novembr. an. MDCCXXI in auditorio hyberno horis consuetis
